howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Type a natural language description of the cards you want to find. For example: 'green creatures that ramp' or 'board wipes under $5 for commander'.
howItWorks.step2Desc: OffMeta shows you the Scryfall query it generated from your description. You can see exactly what syntax was used and edit it if needed.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Scroll through the matching cards. Click any card to see full details including oracle text, prices, legalities, and all printings.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Use the filter chips to narrow results by color, format, card type, mana cost, price, or rarity without rewriting your search.
faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: OffMeta is a natural language search tool for Magic: The Gathering cards. Instead of learning complex Scryfall syntax, you can describe what you're looking for in plain English and OffMeta translates it into a valid search query.
faq.q2: How does natural language MTG card search work?
faq.a2: OffMeta uses AI to understand your search intent and converts it into Scryfall search syntax. For example, typing 'cheap green ramp spells' becomes a proper query filtering by color, card type, mana cost, and oracle text for mana-producing effects.
faq.a3: Yes, OffMeta is completely free to use. There are no accounts required, no subscriptions, and no limits on searches.
faq.q4: Where does OffMeta get its card data?
faq.a4: OffMeta uses the Scryfall API as its data source. Scryfall maintains a comprehensive, up-to-date database of all Magic: The Gathering cards including oracle text, prices, legalities, and card images.
faq.q5: Can I use OffMeta to search for Commander/EDH cards?
faq.a5: Yes! You can search for cards legal in any format including Commander, Standard, Modern, Legacy, and more. Simply mention the format in your search like 'commander legal board wipes under $5' or use the format filter chips.
